name: Hyper Maze
description:
Do you like mazes and getting lost? Read on!

In Hyper Maze you have to navigate a labyrinth from a third person perspective, that's is procedural generate for each time. The rooms themselves keeps moving around, so get ready to get lost!

While you are getting lost, you also have to navigate around some of the deadtraps, there are dotted around in the Hyper Maze. And try to find some of the secret rooms to.

There are some clues to where the traps and secret rooms are located, so keep an vigilant eye out for them.

Happy navigating the Hyper Maze!

http://www.headlessgreenpigs.com/
